Welcome to Skills Workflow’s documentation¶

Skills Workflow is a groundbreaking platform for agencies. A platform to design your agency. People make the difference.

Brand it, shape it, own it

Take ownership of the look and feel of the tool. Tailor it to your agency needs and show information the way you always wanted. If the tons of features, that ship with the platform, don’t take you were you want to go, you can use low level extensibility:

  • Use the SDK to extend behaviour with JavaScript
  • Call on the API to change data and apply rules
  • Resort to the Automation Engine to integrate with other tools
No Code

Create your own dashboards and interactive screens simply by specifying what you want to show and how you want it to look like. Then, just turn on interactivity to change data or trigger processes:

  • Pre-defined behaviours for all main features
  • Adapt existing dashboards to create new ones
  • Create the interactive dashboards you have always needed
Top user experience

Create interactive dashboards, perfect for the purpose you need, for each profile at the agency, be it a manager, a head, an executor, a client or even an external contractor or supplier:

  • Define the way you want the menu to look like
  • Become an artist, create a dashboard for each need
  • Add rich interactivity that elevates productivity
  • Use your own language. Don’t accept software jargon
  • Access rights to features and security access to data
Beautiful Insights

Have full visibility on what’s going on inside the agency with powerful beautiful visualizations of your data. Use pre-built interactive dashboards or build your own.

  • Transform your project data into gorgeous visualizations
  • Convey the big picture into interactive dashboards
  • Customize the color, shape, size or pictures
  • Choose from a vast selection of different charts and diagrams
